net.sf.appia.protocols.common
Class RegisterSocketEvent

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.appia.core.Event
      net.sf.appia.protocols.common.RegisterSocketEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
SslRegisterSocketEvent
public class RegisterSocketEvent
extends Event

RegisterSocketEvent is the event that must be received by UdpSimpleSession or TcpCompleteSession prior to any SendableEvent. It notifies the Session of the UDP ot TCP port number to be used. The event is sent back with an error message (in the case that there is an error), the local host and the port number to be used by other protocols.

Author:
Hugo Miranda and Nuno Carvalho
See Also:
Event, UdpSimpleSession, TcpCompleteSession, SendableEvent

public static final int FIRST_AVAILABLE

RESOURCE_BUSY_ERROR

public static final int RESOURCE_BUSY_ERROR
Error code that indicates that the requested resource is busy. This means that the resource was bound by another process or entity.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RESOURCE_ALREADY_BOUND_ERROR

public static final int RESOURCE_ALREADY_BOUND_ERROR
Error code that indicates that the requested resource is already bound by the same process or entity (Appia instance).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

localHost

public java.net.InetAddress localHost
Local address of the socket.
The UdpSimpleSession binds its UDP socket to this address. If null, one of the addresses of the machine is chosen, and bound to the socket. The address chosing is done by HostUtils.

See Also:
UdpSimpleSession

port

public int port
The port to be used by the transport session.

error

public boolean error
Indicator of error condition.

Constructor Detail

RegisterSocketEvent

public RegisterSocketEvent(Channel channel,
                           int dir,
                           Session source,
                           int port)
                    throws AppiaEventException
Creates a RegisterSocketEvent initializing all the necessary attributes. Events using this constructor don't need to be initialized. After a port is assigned the event is sent upwards.

Parameters:
channel - The Channel where the event will flow
dir - The direction of the event
source - The session generating the event
port - The port number that will be binded to the UdpSimpleSession
Throws:
AppiaEventException
See Also:
Event

RegisterSocketEvent

public RegisterSocketEvent(Channel channel,
                           int dir,
                           Session source)
                    throws AppiaEventException
Creates a RegisterSocketEvent initializing all the necessary attributes. Events using this constructor don't need to be initialized. Using this constructor the system chooses an unused port. After a port is assigned the event is sent informing the interested layers of the actual actual used port.

Parameters:
channel - The Channel where the event will flow
dir - The direction of the event
source - The session generating the event
Throws:
AppiaEventException
